attributes.review: Once I opened the app, I was absolutely disgusted. Absolutely unacceptable to have this app!! Nightmares could occur and childhood trauma as well as PTSD and it could absolutely ruin they're future. Think of the children, despicable people 😡😡

attributes.review: I opened up my app to be greeted by donnys NUD3.. yes his lil dangly wangly was just there 😔 I decided to then delete the app and when I thought things couldn’t get worse all of a sudden trumps men were at my door.
